mapper.select: SELECT c1.*,c2.codeName,d.name,s.sponsorNo FROM Commitment c1 left join Sponsor s on c1.sponsorID=s.ID left join Code c2 on c1.paymentMethodID=c2.ID LEFT JOIN DonationPurpose d on c1.donationPurposeID=d.ID WHERE s.ID=#{id}
SELECT count(*) FROM Commitment c join Sponsor s on c.sponsorID=s.ID WHERE c.sponsorID = #{sponsorID}
mapper.insert: INSERT Commitment (sponsorID, [commitmentNo], donationPurposeID, paymentMethodID, commitmentDate, startDate, endDate, etc) VALUES (#{sponsorID}, (SELECT s.sponsorNo + '-' +REPLACE(STR(count(*)+1,2), ' ', '0') FROM Commitment c join Sponsor s on c.sponsorID=s.ID WHERE c.sponsorID = #{sponsorID} group by s.sponsorNo), #{donationPurposeID}, #{paymentMethodID}, getDate(), getDate(), getDate(), #{etc})
mapper.update: UPDATE Commitment SET startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, etc=#{etc} WHERE ID = #{ID}
